The image showing the: thank you" message in a corn field was circulated on social media in the days leading up to Veterans Day in November 2020.
The photograph is a genuine depiction of: Thanks to those who serve" written in a corn field.
The corn maze is located at Farmer J: s Corn Maze in Dundee, Michigan, as reported by Bedford Now, a local Michigan newspaper.
The owner of the maze: Lyle Jaworski, confirmed that the design was created to honor the military and that the family has been building corn mazes in Dundee for the past 20 years.
